name: ai.mcpanalytics/analytics
description: Professional statistical analysis platform with 50+ ML/statistics tools. Run regression, clustering, time series forecasting, and more directly from Claude or Cursor. Features OAuth2 authentication, encrypted datasets, and shareable interactive reports.

examples.title: Run Linear Regression
examples.description: Analyze relationships between variables with linear regression
examples.code: Use discover_tools('predict sales regression') then tools_run with your dataset

examples.title: Customer Segmentation
examples.code: Use tools_run with 'analytics__ml__clustering__kmeans' on customer data

examples.title: Time Series Forecasting
examples.code: Use tools_run with 'analytics__statistical__time_series__arima' on historical data
